name: Sinbads abandoned road shop
description:
And your readers always demand new content.

    So here you are, out on the road again since it's time for yet another haunted location:

    Sinbads abandoned road shop.

    In the distance, down the road, You see what must be the place as it grows larger as you approach it...

---

Sinbads abandoned road shop is a retro styled horror-adventure-game. For best experience: play alone, with headphones, at night.

Developers note:

Since english is not my first language, please help me by reporting spelling errors in the comments. Thanks!
